name: Steamed Broccoli with Warm Maple Bacon Dressing
description: The winning combination of warm maple and bacon dress-up steamed broccoli for any occasion.

ingredients.name: large head broccoli
ingredients.additionalInstruction: trimmed and cut into bite-sized pieces

preparation: Cook broccoli in boiling salted water for 4 minutes, or until tender-crisp. Drain and set aside.
While broccoli is cooking, pan-fry bacon in frying pan, stirring until slightly crisp. Sprinkle with Maple Spice Sweet Dip Mix.
Add remaining ingredients to pan and bring to a quick boil. Drizzle over steamed broccoli immediately before serving.
Toss gently to coat and serve.
tips: Serving Suggestion: Serve with grilled chicken breast.
